bio: Hi, I'm Victor from Madrid, Spain. I've been coding since 2020. A year later, I was accepted into 42 School, where I learned a variety of technologies and foundational software development principles.
Currently, I'm focusing on cloud environments and working to enhance my skills through certifications. I have a particular interest in automation and DevOps practices.
When I'm not at my desk, you'll probably find me lifting weights, playing football, or exploring new restaurants ðŸ™‚
about.work_intro: Here are some of the places I have worked.
about.education_intro: Right now I'm focused on completing Software Engineering at 42 Madrid.
